class.name: SimpleReader
class.description: Store the base parameters need for the SimpleReader

field.name: locale
field.label: Locale
field.description: Locale used to parse double and float values (BCP47 language tag representing the locale)

field.name: automaticTypesDetection
field.label: Automatic types detection
field.description: This flag activate the autodetection of types. Can be slow.

field.name: pointFields
field.label: Point fields
field.description: This field allow to add a Geometry column to the table. It is a list of field names separated by commas used as dimensions for the attribute GEOM of type point to add to the table.

field.name: CRS
field.description: The coordinate reference system used when use the point parameter to generate a layer

field.name: geoemtryFieldName
field.label: Geometry field name
field.description: Name os the field used to store the point if a 'point fields' are specified

field.name: fieldNames
field.label: Field names
field.description: Comma separated list of field names or empty if parsed automatically

field.name: fieldtypes
field.label: Field types
field.description: Comma separated list of field types. If empty strings are assumed (Eg: integer,string,double,boolean,float,geometry).

field.name: ignoreErrors
field.label: Ignore errors
field.description: Set to true to ignore errors during load of data.
